name: 3 min. Calendar
catch: Create your business calendar in 3 minutes.
description: Save time for busy small business owners. Share instantly on Instagram or LINE.

og.title: 3 min. Calendar
og.description: Create this month's business calendar in just 3 minutes

features.title: One-Click Editing
features.description: Click dates to toggle business days and holidays. Intuitive operation anyone can use immediately.

features.title: 20+ Countries Supported
features.description: Automatic holidays for 20+ countries, not just Japan. Perfect for international businesses.

features.title: Rokuyo Display
features.description: Japanese traditional calendar days (Taian, Butsumetsu) shown automatically. Great for wedding/funeral industries.

features.title: QR Code Generation
features.description: Auto-generate QR codes for calendar URLs. Completely offline, secure and safe.

features.title: 14 Color Themes
features.description: 7 light and 7 dark color variations. Match your store's atmosphere.

features.title: PWA Support
features.description: Works offline, installable to home screen. Edit anytime, anywhere.
